div.bibl: The Greek Press, Jan. 1, 1937SCHOLARSHIP FUND DANCE

body.p: The Fifth Annual Scholarship Fund Dance of the Greek Women's University Club is to be given Friday evening, February 5, 1937, at the Electric Club, 20 No. Wacker Drive, from nine o'clock to one o'clock. Proceeds will be used for the maintenance of "The Greek Women's University Club Scholarship" at the University of Chicago. Admission is one dollar.
